1.name: So This Is College
1.description: Biff and Eddie are the best of friends. They are college seniors, roommates at the fraternity, and star teammates on the USC football team. Then a flapper named Babs enters the picture. ...                See full summary »

2.name: Die Büchse der Pandora
2.description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

3.name: The Cocoanuts
3.description: During the Florida land boom, The Marx Brothers run a hotel, auction off some land, thwart a jewel robbery, and generally act like themselves.

4.name: Frau im Mond
4.description: A tenacious scientist blasts off for the moon in hopes of riches that may be found there.

5.name: The Broadway Melody
5.description: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

6.name: Blackmail
6.description: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.

7.name: The Great Gabbo
7.description: An insanely, egocentric ventriloquist, even though he is possessed by his wooden dummy, is in love with a dancer who is in love with another. The dummy gives advice to the ventriloquist.

8.name: Glorifying the American Girl
8.description: The rise of a showgirl, Gloria Hughes, culminating in a Ziegfeld extravaganza "Glorifying the American Girl".

9.name: The Hollywood Revue of 1929
9.description: An all-star revue featuring MGM contract players.

10.name: Hallelujah
10.description: A sharecropper decides to become a preacher after falling for a vamp from the city.

11.name: The Valiant
11.description: After killing an unknown man for an unknown reason, a mysterious drifter turns himself to the law, under a false name intending to protect his own family's honor. But when the news of his ...                See full summary »

12.name: The Virginian
12.description: A good-natured cowboy who is romancing the new schoolmarm has a crisis of conscience when he discovers his best friend is engaged in cattle rustling.

13.name: The Canary Murder Case
13.description: A beautiful showgirl, nicknamed 'the Canary', is a scheming nightclub singer. Blackmailing is her game and soon ends up dead. But who killed 'the Canary'. All the suspects who knew her had ...                See full summary »

14.name: Madame X
14.description: A young lawyer unknowingly defends his mother who abandoned him when he was three.

15.name: The Love Parade
15.description: The queen of mythical Sylvania marries a courtier, who finds his new life unsatisfying.

16.name: Piccadilly
16.description: A young Chinese woman, working in the kitchen at a London dance club, is given the chance to become the club's main act which soon leads to a plot of betrayal, forbidden love and murder.

17.name: The Wild Party
17.description: Wild girls at a college pay more attention to parties than their classes. But when one party girl, Stella Ames, goes too far at a local bar and gets in trouble, her professor has to rescue ...                See full summary »

18.name: The Kiss
18.description: An unhappily married woman is caught up in scandal and murder when her affection toward a young man is misinterpreted.

19.name: Tagebuch einer Verlorenen
19.description: After falling pregnant to a pharmacist and refusing to marry, a young woman is thrown from her home and sent to a scrict girls' reform school.

20.name: The Manxman
20.description: A fisherman and a rising young lawyer, who grew up as brothers, fall in love with the same girl.

21.name: Bulldog Drummond
21.description: A bored WWI veteran helps out a young woman, whose uncle is being held hostage by embezzlers.

22.name: Show of Shows
22.description: It's 1929. The studio gave the cinema its voice gave offered the audiences a chance to see their favorite actors and actresses from the silent screen era to see and for the first time can ...                See full summary »

23.name: The Single Standard
23.description: The wealthy Arden Stuart is bored in a party; after refusing the wedding proposal of Tommy Hewlett, she drives her car with her driver to a lonely place. She has one night stand with him ...                See full summary »

24.name: Spite Marriage
24.description: An unimpressive but well intending man is given the chance to marry a popular actress, of whom he has been a hopeless fan. But what he doesn't realize is that he is being used to make the actress' old flame jealous.

25.name: The Iron Mask
25.description: King Louis XIII of France is thrilled to have born to him a son - an heir to the throne. But when the queen delivers a twin, Cardinal Richelieu sees the second son as a potential for ...                See full summary »

26.name: Hell's Heroes
26.description: When four men rob a bank, one is killed and the other three escape into the desert where they lose their horses in a storm. Finding a woman who gives birth, they are made godfathers only to...                See full summary »

27.name: The Wolf Song
27.description: In 1840, Sam Lash heads west for adventure. He meets up with some Mountain Men, and they head for the Rockies to trap beavers and cats. In Taos he meets Lola, a beautiful Mexican girl from ...                See full summary »

28.name: The Locked Door
28.description: On her first anniversary Ann Reagan finds that her sister-in-law is involved with a shady character from her own past, and determines to intervene.

29.name: Die weiße Hölle vom Piz Palü
29.description: A man climbs a 12,000-foot mountain to search for his wife, who was lost on their honeymoon. Another couple makes the dangerous climb with him.

30.name: Oblomok imperii
30.description: A story of a man who loses his memory during the First World War, regains it 10 years after the Russian Revolution and returns home to a new and alien St. Petersburg.

31.name: The Thirteenth Chair
31.description: Although his murdered friend was by all accounts a scoundrel a true "bounder" Edward Wales is determined to trap his killer by staging a seance using a famous medium. Many of the 13 seance ...                See full summary »

32.name: Staroye i novoye
32.description: 100.000.000 peasants - illiterate, poor, hungry. There comes a day when one woman decides that she can live old life no longer. Using ways of new Soviet state and industrial progress she changes life and labor of her village.

33.name: Coquette
33.description: A flirtatious Southern belle is compromised with one of her suitors.

34.name: The Trespasser
34.description: The trial and tribulations of a strong-willed woman who elopes and gives birth out of wedlock without telling her ex-husband.

35.name: The Mysterious Island
35.description: On a volcanic island near the kingdom of Hetvia rules Count Dakkar, a benevolent leader and scientist who has eliminated class distinction among the island's inhabitants. Dakkar, his ...                See full summary »

36.name: The Letter
36.description: Jeanne Eagels plays the bored and restless Leslie Crosbie who turns to another man, Geoffrey Hammond (Herbert Marshall) for attention when neglected by her husband Robert (Reginald Owen). ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Taming of the Shrew
37.description: In sixteenth century Padua, Hortensio loves Bianca, the youngest daughter of Baptista. But Baptista will not allow the two to get married until his eldest daughter, the extremely headstrong...                See full summary »

38.name: The Informer
38.description: In Ireland, an IRA man betrays a killer to the police, thinking he is his mistress's lover.

39.name: Arsenal
39.description: A soldier returns to Kiev after surviving a train crash and encounters clashes between nationalists and collectivists.

40.name: Welcome Danger
40.description: Harold Bledsoe, a botany student, is called back home to San Francisco, where his late father had been police chief, to help investigate a crime wave in Chinatown.

41.name: Sunnyside Up
41.description: Molly and Bee, sweet young 'working girls,' live in a cheap room over a New York grocery store. Molly's idol, wealthy Jack Cromwell, lives in a Long Island mansion but is markedly less ...                See full summary »

42.name: Lucky Star
42.description: Mary, a poor farm girl, meets Tim just as word comes that war has been declared. Tim enlists in the army and goes to the battlefields of Europe, where he is wounded and loses the use of his...                See full summary »

43.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
43.description: A ruthless stockbroker sells short in the copper business and ruins the life of his friends by ruining their finances.

44.name: The Saturday Night Kid
44.description: Mayme and sister Janie are salesgirls in Ginsberg's Department Store. Mayme is in love with store clerk Bill, but Janie tries to steal him from her. Hazel, another salesgirl, is Jean Harlow's first credited role.

45.name: The Black Watch
45.description: Captain Donald King of the British Army goes to India just as World War I breaks out, convincing his comrades that he is a coward. In reality, he is on a secret mission to rescue British ...                See full summary »

46.name: The Mysterious Dr. Fu Manchu
46.description: During the Boxer Rebellion in China during the early 20th century, in which a Chinese secret society attacked all westerners and anyone who associated with them, Dr. Fu Manchu's wife and ...                See full summary »

47.name: The Bishop Murder Case
47.description: When the body of a man nicknamed "Cock Robin" is found with an arrow in the heart on an archery range along with a chess bishop as a clue, Philo Vance investigates.

48.name: Where East Is East
48.description: When an animal trapper in Indo-China finds that his daughter's fiancé is being successfully seduced by her estranged mother, he takes appropriate action.

50.name: Desert Nights
50.description: A con man and his beautiful accomplice kidnap a manager and steal $500,000 worth of diamonds, but end up stranded in the desert without water.
